attributes.action: Make the Parliament concerned of the expansion of the Holy mosque in Medina and express the anger of british, irish and scottish muslims
attributes.additional_details: Reguarding the extension (destruction) of one of Islams most holiest sites Masjid un Nabwi we urge the public to stand up against this injustice of not just muslims in Saudi Arabia or the United kingdom but of muslims around the whole world....the saudi government in the past 20 years have become more inclined to immitate other cultures and places and as a loss islamic history is slowly being demolished how will our future understand the significance of these places if the history is being erased...so we urge the government to please intervene and mention the concerns of the muslims of the UK and also speak to the Saudi Arabian government about this....
